SED2: The people of [Root.GetName] have developed their language and customs to a point where they may now be considered part of a distinct branch of Norse culture. They have begun to refer to themselves as Geats.
SWMH: The people of [Root.GetName] have developed their language and customs to a point where they may now be considered part of a distinct branch of Norse culture. They have begun to refer to themselves as Geats.

SED2: What will they think of next, I wonder.
SWMH: What will they think of next, I wonder.

SED2: Welcome into the fold, my Geat brothers and sisters.
SWMH: Welcome into the fold, my Geat brothers and sisters.
